Peter N. Stearns - World History

World History is a comprehensive textbook that covers the entire scope of human history from ancient civilizations to modern times. It provides an in-depth analysis of various cultures, empires, and societies, highlighting their achievements, conflicts, and interactions. The book explores the complex relationships between different regions and civilizations, shedding light on the processes that have shaped our world. With a focus on critical thinking and analytical skills, World History encourages readers to think critically about the past and its relevance to the present.

  • art history
  • bible
  • budhism
  • criminal law
  • economics
  • film studies
  • finance
  • human genetics
  • international relations
